column4: Latest;PARIS (Reuters) – Cambodia has reported an outbreak of the highly pathogenic H5N6 bird flu virus among poultry
column5: the Paris-based World Organisation for Animal Health (OIE) said on Thursday
column6: citing a report from Cambodia’s agriculture ministry.------The virus infected poultry birds at a market in Daunkeo (Takeo) in the south of the country
column7: the report said.------Reuters------ Reporting by Gus Trompiz; Editing by Susan Fenton------*This comes ------3 weeks after Cambodia reported------ three outbreaks involving low-pathogenic H7N4.------*
